name: They Are Back!
description:
*All sounds used in game are royalty free*

STORY:

"It Happened for the first time 5 years ago. Since then it happened more and more all over the world. No one knows what they are or where they come from. But once again...... They are back!"

GAMEPLAY:

(Please use Headphones)

First Person Horror game, Atmospheric Walking Simulator. Simple Puzzles, Few Jump scares and a few Chase Scenes (don't get caught)

  • WASD to move
  • F for flashlight (when you have it)
  • E or Mouse Click to Interact
  • Shift to Run (When the game allows you to run)
  • Right Mouse to Zoom

A WORD FROM THE DEVELOPER:

I am far from a professional Game Developer, I hardly know what I am doing, so don't expect the game to be perfect in anyway. 

That said I do enjoy trying to put together these small Horror project, as I am a very big horror fan my self.

I use Unreal Engine 4 for my projects. (not dived into UE5 yet) 

Let me know in the comments what you think, if you decide to pick up this game.

Thanks for checking it out. Hope you will enjoy.

Max Horror.
